I believe in hard work, I know how good it feel to provide for myself and family...I want others to enjoy this privileged feeling. I love to earn my own money, and It feels so good to be independent... I'm the single parent of 2 wonderful children and I want them to be proud of me. We are blessed with all we need and with great love I pay it forward. Kindness is not an option, generosity is. Good Luck with your dream!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in sales.I thank God for work. Even when its financially hard, I pass on a blessing as often as I can...and hopefully Inspire many who can to do  the same. Only then will we make a global difference.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because:
Don’t Lend… Give
The Lord looks favorably on any Christian who gives selflessly to others. Lending money can be complicated. There is always the issue of when and how it gets paid back, what the money is being used for, and the relationship between the borrower and lender. If a friend or loved one is in need of money, why not simply give it to them? This relieves the burden on both of you of worrying about how it will be repaid. And, it’s a good Christian thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info:
Did you know that the most powerful person in the world is one who loves God and is wealthy!  
 
It is my desire for that to be my destiny and my manifestation! I'm Looking forward to being a blessing to the world! 
 
So remember;  Always....."Delight yourself in the Lord, and He will grant you the desires of your heart."  Psalm 37:4 
 
"I am a manager of cash to help propagate the Gospel of Jesus Christ our Lord"

lenders.name: Gifted Hands
lenders.occupational_info:
“Teachers are Inspired by the Goal and not the Gold Event”

I’m so inspired by the Goal and not the Gold at increasing the school readiness of young children in single and low-income families. I started my own in-Home daycare and was inspired to start a center locally in the North Charleston, South Carolina area and to spread to other communities and this is why I’m asking for your help to fund my “Goal Event” to provide this service to the community. The “Goal Event” will raise vital funds for Gifted Hands CDC. Gifted Hands will be a comprehensive child development center that serves children from birth to age 5, after-school and their families. “Gifted Hands” will increase the school readiness of young children, provide education, early childhood development and computer technology to children in low-income areas, also creating tomorrow’s workforce, future leaders and inventors.

lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed! I come from a very poor family too and so many people were willing to donate to help me get started! God is the center of my life and my career!

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because:
A man goes out on the beach and sees that it is covered with starfish that have washed up in the tide.  A little boy is walking along, picking them up and throwing them back into the water.

"What are you doing, son?" the man asks.  "You see how many starfish there are?  You'll never make a difference."

The boy paused thoughtfully, and picked up another starfish and threw it into the ocean.

"It sure made a difference to that one," he said.
-Hawaiian parable

I believe we are to love God first, love people unconditionally, and that our missions is sharing His Good News (Matthew 22:36-40 and 28:18-20). Pure and genuine religion in the sight of God the Father means caring for the poor in their distress and refusing to let the world corrupt (James 1:27).

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me, and I want to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother and wife, I do many of the same things that all mothers do.  I cook, clean, care for my kids, and try to keep my family healthy and happy. I have severe rheumatoid arthritis so I do not work outside the home.

lenders.name: Tom Malloy

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: its a wonderful way to get people started on their path to success.........

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: it's a pretty darn awesome way to make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Officially, I study and learn as much as I can about a particular subject. Unofficially, I have some fun while I do it! With the occasional bouts of stress thrown in.

lenders.name: Lena
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I'd like to have a positive effect on others.

lenders.name: shirley
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and spend my time mentoring children, keeping my grandchildren, singing in 2 choirs and have a charity knitting group at my house once a month.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: People who want to improve their situations should have the opportunity to do so.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: "The highest degree of all is where one strengthens the hands of another who faces poverty, giving him a gift or a loan, entering into a business partnership with him, or giving him a job in order to strengthen his hand and to prevent him from becoming an object of Tzedakah (charity)" - Rabbi Moshe ben Maimon, Medieval Jewish scholar
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a rabbi, with the goal of spreading joy, inspiration and understanding throughout the world.

lenders.name: Karl Haddad
lenders.loan_because: a $200 loan is the cost of ONE night out with ure girl with a nice dinner, wine, and other sortie elements. OR, and thats a big OR, change somebodys life for far more than a single night.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: It's good to share.  It's right to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on an endangered language.  Through our research we hope to save this language from dying out.

lenders.loan_because:
